an4.131:4.1: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
an4.131:4.3: One person hasn’t given up the lower fetters, the fetters for getting reborn, or the fetters for getting a continued existence.
an4.131:5.1: One person has given up the lower fetters, but not the fetters for getting reborn, or the fetters for getting a continued existence.
an4.131:6.1: One person has given up the lower fetters and the fetters for getting reborn, but not the fetters for getting a continued existence.
an4.131:7.1: One person has given up the lower fetters, the fetters for getting reborn, and the fetters for getting a continued existence.
an4.131:8.1: What person hasn’t given up the lower fetters, the fetters for getting reborn, or the fetters for getting a continued existence?
an4.131:8.3: This is the person who hasn’t given up the lower fetters, the fetters for getting reborn, or the fetters for getting a continued existence.
an4.131:9.1: What person has given up the lower fetters, but not the fetters for getting reborn, or the fetters for getting a continued existence?
an4.131:9.2: One heading upstream, going to the Akaniṭṭha realm.
an4.131:10.1: What person has given up the lower fetters and the fetters for getting reborn, but not the fetters for getting a continued existence?
an4.131:10.2: One extinguished in-between one life and the next.
an4.131:11.1: What person has given up the lower fetters, the fetters for getting reborn, and the fetters for getting a continued existence?
an4.131:11.4: These are the four people found in the world.”
